snippet: The problem of sexual assaults on college campuses must be accurately studied and quantified.
abstract: Editorial argues that journalistic lapses by Rolling Stone article describing gang rape of a college freshman have further muddied already-murky waters surrounding issue of campus sexual assault; contends problem has not yet been accurately studied and quantified; endorses bipartisan Congressional proposal that would require colleges to conduct anonymous, standardized surveys on sexual violence.
lead_paragraph: The problem of sexual assaults on college campuses must be accurately studied and quantified.

headline.main: Rolling Stone and Rape on Campus
headline.print_headline: Rolling Stone and Rape on Campus
